author: Josh
install_msg: Discord Plays Pokemon cog installed! Use [p]dpp help to get started.
name: DiscordPlaysPokemon
short: Community-driven Pokemon gameplay through Discord messages.
description: Allows Discord users to collectively control a Pokemon game by sending button inputs as chat messages. The game screen is periodically updated as a screenshot. Also passively harvests input letters from messages across the entire server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
